metadata.title: CVE-2024-43821 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: lpfc: Fix a possible null pointer dereferenceIn function lpfc_xcvr_data_show, the memory allocation with kmalloc mightfail, thereby making rdp_context a null pointer. In the following contextand functions that use this pointer, there are dereferencing operations,leading to null pointer dereference.To fix this issue, a null pointer check should be added. If it is null,use scnprintf to notify the user and return len.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
